awd_titl_txt: Engineering Foundation Conference on Dispersion and         Aggregation:  Fundamentals and Applications,                March 15 - 20, 1992, Palm Coast, FL
awd_abstract_narration: The award provides partial support to organize and publish the                  proceedings of the "Engineering Foundation Conference on                        Dispersion and Aggregation:  Fundamentals and Applications"                     (March 15-20, 1992 in Florida).  The objective of the                           Conference is to bring together researchers, users and                          equipment manufactures from different disciplines to shear new                  developments in the field.  The basic principles of dispersion                  and aggregation are similar in paper and pulp, paints,                          minerals and other industries.  Outstanding university                          researchers and industry representatives will have the                          opportunity to review the state-of-the-art and new technology                   in this field.
org_div_long_name: Division of Chemical, Bioengineering, Environmental, and Transport Systems
